document.full_text: kei igawa, a minor league left-hander from oarai, ibaraki prefecture, left the yankees' complex so he could contact relatives and try to locate his family.
document.title: igawa leaves yankees after earthquake strikes japan
lines_and_colors: kei igawa, a minor league left-hander from oarai, ibaraki prefecture, left the yankees' complex so he could contact relatives and try to locate his family.
